channel.title: Nixos on Takara
channel.description: Recent content in Nixos on Takara

item.title: Nixos Installation Guide
item.description: What is NixOs # NixOS is a Linux distribution renowned for its unique approach to package management and system configuration. It employs a purely functional package management system that ensures reproducibility and eliminates version conflicts.
